page.shortlink: viewbox sample menu with css icons
page.description: Example demonstrating a menu of items with CSS icons.
page.discussion: The Menu with CSS Icons is similar to the List of States. Each item in the Menu has an event that can be used to perform an action, such as displaying a popup, opening a UX Component, or displaying another Panel in the application. Using a ViewBox control to display a menu serves as a light-weight alternative to using a List control to display a menu.

section.description: The Menu with CSS Icons template example is loaded by clicking the Load Sample ViewBox link on the Home tab of the ViewBox Builder.
